name: Super Mando
description: Super "Mando" need your help to travel the city searching what his wife asked him to buy urgent, the streets the subway the stores, everything full of crazy cars and jumping motorcycles, ride a drone dodge the obstacles to reach your goal. This is a retro platformer game with 32 levels to jump and crush the trafict of the city, find cookies and hammers that will help you complete the levels, collect tokens to redeem them for lives and powerups.
